title: Ascension locked at 30 fps for me.
body:
Okay when i play normals, my fps tends to be around 120-140.
But whenever i try to play ascension it doesnt go over 30, and makes the game really slow and sluggish to play.
I tried uncapping my fps, and lowering my quality to Low, and its still max 30.
Is there any solution to this, thanks in advance.

replies.body:
You're lucky.
Max i can hit is 15 fps.
My average is 10 fps.

There might be something going on with your drivers that aren't working very well with Ascension. Let's go through the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just in case you just need some driver updates. Hit me back up if that doesn't help much!

Hello,
Thank you for your help, i updated my drivers and the game now runs smoothly
I can finally play ascension normally, Thanks once again and have a great day.
